DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of collection represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date [DDTESTCD]
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date [DDTESTCD] assessment was collected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the date of collection using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: DDDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable DDDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A single date may be collected for all death detail assessments when they are collected on the same date. The date of collection of each assessment can also be collected using a CDASH variable [DDTESTCD]_DDDAT. The date of the assessment may be determined from a collected date of visit and in such cases a separate assessment date field is not required.
